channel.title: Can I get an answer to my question?
channel.description:
Hello. :smiley: I am new to this forum. But you can see for sure. I'm actually from China, but currently lives abroad. But it is not Belgium, since you wonder. But due. my bad English, I decided to write up everything in Google Translate. So far it works great, thank you for asking.
But I have also just words in a way played Half Life2! : D But I have a couple questions for you, thank you for it there. The thing is that there is a lot of killing and such, and that's ok. But I have asked myself "what if this really is real people, such as in the movie" Gamer "or similar?" But I see at once that such thoughts are only silly and nonsense. Fortunately I'm up for good at these mills joke. But as the seriousness: Why is not one bad woman throughout the game? If you do not call her Alberta who are with me through half the game, then. She is kind. I think. Maybe she really is evil, but it says nothing about the legend. And thankfully for that, I must point out, otherwise I had also killed her. And women should not kill. So it really answered the question. Funny how things twisting out, or what?
The funniest is really not all killing. I think the most fun in the game is the fact that the fight against things that are not real! It is just the snout witty! But so funny is it does not really. It is a sort of wonder at all the strange things to be found in the world. Take plankton whether that. They are small, tiny, but then eat hamburgers and other stuff and nonsense. It is because quite sad. But, as my mother always said, "one should not cry over milk played," what now than it means. So: The question I would ask! How is it to not play the game?

well those stupid translators always f**ck some words and/or expressions.

item.dc:creator: Andy0101
item.description:
Thanks. You can try it out too, just randomly translate into other language and paste the translation into the textbox; repeat until satisfied, and then translate into English.
But I don’t understand how did “My question!” got turned into “P!” and then into “Blood!” Also, the sentence “The problem is welcome.” seems to always be preserved. :3

The EU will benefit from the fact liderar, movies, but I think that in Belgium, but Boire Little English, decided to write a new Google Translate, you can create a "The problem is welcome.

Tea:

Hello. I am new to this forum. But you can see for sure.
I’m actually from China, but currently lives abroad. But it is not Belgium, since you wonder. But due. my bad English, I decided to write up everything in Google Translate. So far it works great, thank you for asking.

But I have also just words in a way played Half Life2! : D
But I have a couple questions for you, thank you for it there.
The thing is that there is a lot of killing and such, and that’s ok. But I have asked myself “what if this really is real people, such as in the movie” Gamer “or similar?” But I see at once that such thoughts are only silly and nonsense. Fortunately I’m up for good at these mills joke. But as the seriousness: Why is not one bad woman throughout the game? If you do not call her Alberta who are with me through half the game, then. She is kind. I think. Maybe she really is evil, but it says nothing about the legend. And thankfully for that, I must point out, otherwise I had also killed her. And women should not kill. So it really answered the question. Funny how things twisting out, or what?

The funniest is really not all killing. I think the most fun in the game is the fact that the fight against things that are not real! It is just the snout witty! But so funny is it does not really. It is a sort of wonder at all the strange things to be found in the world. Take plankton whether that. They are small, tiny, but then eat hamburgers and other stuff and nonsense.
